mean_cn: adj. 形成的；造形的；影响发展的；格式化的；  n. 构词要素
mean_en: having an important and lasting influence on the development of something or of somebody’s character
sentence: In the formative period of the watermelon, it was shaped in a box.
sentence_trans: 这个西瓜在它的形成期时被放进盒子里成形。
word_etyma: form形状 + ative……的 → 形成的
